name: Will You Squid
description:
FULLSCREEN FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE

Will You Snail but you play as the AI Squid with eye soring graphics and non-juicy gameplay :D

----How To Play----

Move your mouse to platforms and if it snaps to a grid, then you can place a spike there.  Guess and anticipate where the snail would move to and make your move accordingly just like how the AI would in the real game B)

Make the snail suffer as much as possible in 60 secs for a prize woo~~

Edit: If the web version has some weird glitches then feel free to download the exe version instead!

----Credits---- 

The original game: Will You Snail On Steamm
